negotiator.config

Class MultilateralTournamentConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.config.MultilateralTournamentConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutomatedTournamentConfiguration

    public class MultilateralTournamentConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
    Implementation of MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface. This stores all information for a multilateral tournament. Can load(File) and save(File) to XML. Immutable.
    Author:
    W.Pasman 27jul15

      • getPartyItems

        public java.util.List<PartyRepItem> getPartyItems()
        Description copied from interface: MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
        Gets read-only list of party repository items. This may include mediator(s)
        Specified by:
        getPartyItems in interface MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
        Returns:
        a list of all chosen parties. Only a sub-set of the non-mediators will be used in each session, see also MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface.getNumNonMediatorsPerSession()

      • getPartyProfileItems

        public java.util.List<ProfileRepItem> getPartyProfileItems()
        Description copied from interface: MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
        Gets read-only list of profiles used by the parties. These protocols are used to generate the sessions. The number of available items determines the maximum number of parties in one session.
        Specified by:
        getPartyProfileItems in interface MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
        Returns:
        list of profiles used by the parties

      • getNumNonMediatorsPerSession

        public int getNumNonMediatorsPerSession()
        Specified by:
        getNumNonMediatorsPerSession in interface MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
        Returns:
        the number of non-mediators per session. This can be smaller than size of MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface.getPartyItems() because only a subset of the party items will be used in each session.

      • getNumPartiesPerSession

        public int getNumPartiesPerSession()
        Specified by:
        getNumPartiesPerSession in interface MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
        Returns:
        the number of parties that will be in each session (including mediators).

      • getRepetitionAllowed

        public boolean getRepetitionAllowed()
        Description copied from interface: MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
        Gets whether repetition is allowed when generating combinations of agents.
        Specified by:
        getRepetitionAllowed in interface MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
        Returns:
        true if allowed
